channel.title: Ebook/audio books torrent sites
channel.description: Are there any torrent sites that have lots of ebooks and audiobooks? because i have searched the main ones and all of the ebooks are guides and the audiobooks are really old ( like shakespeare and stuff) are there any sites that have more recent books( that are somewhat written for teens/kids/young adults ect)? ( doesn't have to be torrents)
